div.p:
Curia Balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem pro tribe xxvijo die
mensis augusti Anno quo supra

The saide daye the bailyeis assignit friday that next cumis to Androw Waus tile
ansueir to the borgh fundin one him be Dauid errot that he aw to deliuer til
him or his merchand' the price of xvij skinnis siclik as the laif vas saulde
in france

The said' daye the bailyeis assignit friday that next cumis to richard litster to
Ansuer to the borgh fundin one him be Androw litster that wranguisly and aganis
the lawe the said' richard withhaldis fra him ane' leid quhilk he lent him ande
hais brokin the samyn ande aw to mend' the samyn safer as It is skathit and
deliuer It agane to him

The said' day Wilyeam Abirdour forspekar for Johnne Abirdour his brodir
tuk him to preif one friday that next cumis that the said Johnne' haid sauld'
to petir botis man of the barge sex scoir of lamskinnis ande xxxti futvaile And'
that the said petir tauld and resauit the samyn

The said' daye Richarde litstar one that ane part ande the vif of Androw low
merchand one that vthir part var bundin to stande ande abide at the deliuerancis
of Allane litster and rich Duncane Wandy chosin for the said' richard one
that ane part ande george bisset and Adam veyr chosin for the said wif
of Androw love anent eln' of blankat claitht quhilk was allegijt
spilt in the litting be the said' richarde Quhilk personis sal convene ande
syt apone the said matir this Instant day eftir none

The said' daye Symon ellone grantit him awand' to Johnne fichat youngar
the sovme of aucht pundis vsuale money of scotland' To be pait at the
festis of sanct michael and sanct martine next to cum the hemmast penny

The said' day Symon fleschar vas conuict' be ane suorn' assis' Williame portar
forspekar for the tribulance of thomas leslie bailye in ane fensit cowrt

The said' daye the bailyeis chargit Duncane Craik to remane within the
tolbutht til quhile he haid content ande pait to Symon ellene thre
franche crownis eftir the tenour of the actis maid obefor

The xxix daye of august the yeir forsaid' It was ordanit ande deliuerit be
the prouest bailyeis ande counsel of the saide burgh present for the tyme that
thair sale be gevin til our Souerane lordis henes in propine als mekile
vynis as It plesis his mastir of vyne sellar ande seruitouris to tak til his
henes to giddir with ane' dosane pundis of schorcatis ane dosane of torchis
ane dosane of prikatis and' tua dosane of fyfe of vax quhilk salbe pait
of the first ande the rediast money that can' to be gottin of the townis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltimo die
mensis augustj Anno quo supra

The said' daye Duncane Craik oblist him be the faith of his body to
Content ande pay to Symone ellone or thomas vatsone his factour
in his name xviij s' greit vsuale money of flandris betuix this ande
michaelmis next heireftir in brugez or Campveris Ande failyeing
tharof to pay him thre pundis scottis for Ill the pund' greit betuix
this and mertimes thareftir give the said' Duncane bringis nocht ane' sufficient
acquietancis of the payment of the said xviij s' greit betuix this and the
said' fest of mertimes

The said' day It vas deliuerit be ane suorn' assis' mathow branch for
spekar that petir botis man of the barge is quyt of sex scoir of lam
skinnis and xxxtj futvail persevit be villiame Abirdour

The said' day Thomas Craufurd' deponit be his aith that he
deliuerit to Robert hile out of zeane buris schip quhen he vas clark
of hir tua puncheonis of Claret vyne ande ane puncheone of
quhite wyne in the behalf of hew martin And' Androw vaus deponit
he gat na wyne out of his schip

Curia ballivorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem primo die mensis
Septembris anno quo supra

Eodem die Dauid theman deuenit plegius legalis quod Johannes Kennertj erit
Indempnes pro Willelmo logane aliter quam per viam Juris Et Duncanus fyff
deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Willelmus erit Indempnis pro Johanne Kennertj
aliter quam per viam Juris et vtraque pars obligator ad conseruandum suos plegios Indemp
nes de huismodi fideiussione

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem tercio die mensis
septembris anno quo Supra

Eodem die Richardus Waus fecit constituit creauit et ordinauit thomam Waus et dominum
Dauid Waus coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimos procuratores dans et concedens eisdem ac eorum
alteri et suis substitutis pluribus aut vnj suam liberam potestatem ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum a Roberto
Wat xiiijor s' monete scocie Ac in omnibus aliis actionibus causis et querelis ipsum
tangendum Agendum prosequenudm et defendendum Ac generaliter omnia alia et singula faciendum
et cetera promittens de Rato et grato in vberiora forma procuratorij

Eodem die Andreas Waus fecit Constituit creauit et nominauit thomam Waus et dominum
Dauid Waus coniunctim et diuisim suos legittimos procuratores dans et concedens eisdem ac
eorum alteri et suis substitutis pluribus aut vnj suam liberam potestatem ac mandatum
speciale ad petendum exigendum et recipiendum a Niniano blinsele vigintj solidos in debito
et Inde acquitanudm Ac in omnibus aliis actionibus causis et querelis ipsum tangens
et Agendum prosequendum defendendum Ac omnia alia et singula faciendum et cetera promittens de Rato
et grato in vberiora forma procuratorij

The saide day Alexander nory grauntit him aving to Jonhne malysone xj s' quhilk
the balyeis chargit him to pay within the terme of law

The said' day the balyeis chargit norman leslie to bring his Caucion and Souerte
this day xv dais strenyeabile within the b tolbutht of abirdene for the pament
of xv s' Scottis money aving to alexander nory or ellis to pay the saide Some to the
saide Alexander

The saide day Alexander brabnire was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' Jonhne leslie of War
dris forspekar for tribulance of Alexander neische for the quhilkis he was in Amerciament of the
court and tile amend' as law wile et cetera Ande the saide Alexander neische was conuict' for the
tribulance of the said Alexander brabnire for the quhilkis he was in Amerciament of the court and tile
amend' as wile et cetera Ande Williame hatmakar was conuict' be the saide assis'
for tribulance of the saide alexander neische for the quhilkis he was in Amerciament of the
court et cetera Ande the prouocacioun' herof was fundin in the saide Alexander branire et cetera
And atour the saidez' Alexander brabnire and Williame hatmakar was conuict' be the saidez
assis' Jonhne leslie forspekar for trubilance of William cheishame for the quhilkis
Ilkane of thame was in Amerciament of the Court and tile amend' as law wile and
forbeir' in tyme to cum and the saide Williame cheishame was quyt of ale tribu
lance of the saide Alexander and Williame et cetera for the quhilkis It was ordanit be the
saide assis' that the said Alexander brabnire and Williame hatmakar sale cum one sonday
that next Cumis in tyme of the hiemes' at the begynning of the samyn Ilkan
with ane Candile of wax in thar hande contening j li' and ask the saide Williame
cheishame forgiwnes and Offir the saide ij candillis to the haly blude licht Ande
gif euire

Curia Balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem sexto die mensis
Septembris Anno quo supra

The said' daye martine yhansone skippeir of the hoy vas conuict' be ane suorn'
assise Johnne of mar forspekar for tribulance of the prouost ande the toune
for the violent handis putting in Ducnane porteir in his presens ande attour his
forbeding ffor the quhilk he vas in ane amerciament of the Court tile amend'
as law wile and forber in tyme to cum and' that vas gevin for dome' Alsua
the said' martine vas conuict' be the said' assis' for tribulancis of Duncane porter
And' the said' Duncane porter for the tribulancis of the said' martine ffor the
quhilkis ilkane of thame vas in ane amerciament of the Court tile amend'
as law wile et cetera

The said' daye Martine yansone vas Conuict' be an suorne assis' for the
tribulancis of James Colisoun'

The said' daye villiame boile Com' souerte til entir the said' martine
yansone befor the prouest ande bailyeis the morn' thareftir for ane mendis
to be maid be him for the Crimez and offens' befor writin

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem Septimo
die mensis Septembris Anno quo supra

The said' day the balyeis ordanit and chargit Williame scrimgeour to Warne
thomas Wod to Comper befor thame one monunday that next Cumis to
ansuer' to the borghe' fundin one him be Isabele Rate for the wranguis' Intro
meting with the thridpart of ane half nethis fischingis of the Raik eftir the tenouris
of the Act maid' tharapone Obefor

The saide day cristy Symmire grauntit him avand' to Dauid fynne ane barrele of
salmond' to be pait within terme of lawe

The said' day Dauid straloche grauntit him aving ane barrele of Salmond' to cristy
Symmer' for thomas Wod' and to Releiwe the said' cristy of the samyn at the handis
of Dauid fyne quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within terme of law that
he mycht cale his warand' to freithe him

The saide day the balyeis assignit this day viij dais to Robert hill Dauid fynne tile
ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Robert hill for the wranguis' withhaldin fra
him of aucht merkis

The said' day James Strathachin deponit be his aithe that he and Sandy Duinnahoy tuk ane
forchamer fra mastir Dauid menyeis factoris to the parsone of Caschey and pronuncit to pay
the maile of the samyn

The said' day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' mathow branche forspekar that
Alexander Roche sale Cum one monunday that next Cumis and suer' the gret aithe

The said day Johnne Kemp skynner grantit him seruand' til Androw bawn' quhile
the feist of Witsonday mydsommer next and' Immediat hereftir following

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem decimo die mensis
septembris anno quo Supra

The said' day Androw Waus grantit that he bocht tua puncionis of Claret
wyne to Thomas Waus and his brothir and gert put tham in his schip
and the said' thomas gat bot ane of thame

Eodem die Alisona meldrum elizibetht meldrum Katherina meldrum et
agnes meldrum filia thome meldrum fecerunt et constituerunt Johannem
arthouris Johannem portar Ducanum fyf et Alexandrum Kintor suos suos
legitimos procuratores Actores factores coniunctim et diuisim dans et concedens eisdem ac
eorum cuilibet et suis substitutis pluribus et vnj suam legitimam potestatem et mandatum
speciale ad prosequendum thomam meldrum patrum suum pro carta et
sibi pertinenciis de et super terra et tenemento quam Inhabitat Agendum defendendum
respondendum et calumpniandum et promittens de Rato et grato in vberiora
forma procuratorij cum ceteris clausulis necessariis et oportunis

The said' day thomas meldrum denyit that he had' ony chartiris
pertening tile his four' douchtiris

The said' day the bailyeis chargit thomas pile to remane in to the tolbutht
one to the tyme he pait vj s' and viij d' to ser Dauid Waus obtenit on' him obefor

The said' day Normund' Leslie officiar at the command' of the bailyeis chargit
Thomas pile be his vand' of office to remane within the tolbutht quhile he
set souerte til entir the morn' tile ansueir at the Instantis of ser Johnne Stirueling
for the breking of yettis and durris of ane' land' pertenand' tile him vndir silenc' of
the nycht

The saide day the bailyeis chargit Wilyeam scrimgeour officiar tile deliuer Androw
Waus ane' Countir quhilk he hais provin his obefor of eftir the tenour of the
actis maide tharapone obefor

Curia Balliuorum burgi de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem vndecimo
die mensis Septembris Anno quo supra

The said' day Thomas meldrum was conuict' be ane suorne assis'
Johnne Colisone forspekar for tribulancis of Duncane fif and' the
said' Duncane quyt of ale tribulance

Curia Balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xvijo die
mensis Septembris Anno quo supra

The said' daye Normund leslie officiar grantit the skaitht done to ane'
quart stoip pertenand' to Johnne porter and denyit the wrang'

The said' day ser Dauid vaus grantit him pait be thomas pyle
of vj s' and viij d' of the mertimes terme of ane' butht

The said' daye Normund' leslie vas conuict' be ane suorn' assis' mathow
branch forspekar for the breking off ane' quart stoip pertenand' to Johnne
porter And' the said' Johnne porter In the name of elizabeth maldrum his
wif vas conuict' be the said' assis' mathow branch forspekar for the stribulancis
of the said' Normund' leslie officiar ande disobeying of him in the execucioun'
of his office ffor the Quhilkis Ilkane of thame var in ane amerciament of the
Court til amend' as law wile and' forbeir in tyme to cum and that vas givin
for dome

The said' day Johnne porter oblist him be his landis and gudis tile
entir one monunday him ande Elizabeth meldrum his wif for ane mendis
to be maid to Normund' leslie officiar for the tribulancis of him and disobeing
of him in the execucioun' of his office

The said' day Johnne Andirsone vas conuict' be ane suorn' assis' Mathow branch forspekar
for the wranguis' withhalding fra Elizabeth Cullane of vj s' viij d' for the Witsonday maile
of ane' butht quhilk he haid of his in tak ffor the quhilk he vas in ane amerciament of the
Court tile amend' as law wile and' forbeir in tyme to cum and' that vas gevin for dome'

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvijo die
mensis Septembris anno quo supra

The said' day gilbert menyeis prouest Johne Cullane Johne Colison' and thomas
Waus chosin and Suorne the gret aitht betuix sere Johne malisone one that
ane part Ande androw stratone one that vthir anent the clame of ane Entres'
contening thre fute throw the saide Androuis forlande liand' in the nethirkirkgat
one the northt part of the samyn gat to the said' sere Johnez yarde quhilkis
personis riplie avisit the evidencis richtis and resonis' of the said partiis
herde sene and vndirstandin fande and deliuerit that the saide sere Johne suld' haue
ane entres' to his yarde throw the said' lande contening thre fute in breid'
hemlie quhilkis entres' the saide personis and Androw assignit to the saide sere Johne
at ane dur' maid nerrast the saide ser Johnez' forland' one the est part

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vicesimooctauo die
mensis Septembris Anno quosupra

Eodem die Willelmus Wormet amarciatur per confessionem lingue proprie
pro pertubio curie Et emendabit vt Jura volunt

Eodem die Willelmus Kintor deuenit plegius legalis quos Thomas Athole
erit Indempnis pro Willelmo Wormet aliter quam per viam Juris Et Johannes
andersone deuenit plegius legalis quos dictus Willelmus erit Indempnis de prefato
thoma aliter quam per viam Juris Et dictos partes obligantur ad conseruandum suos
plegios Indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione

Eodem die Johannes Colisone deuuenit plegius legalis quod Willelmus Wormet
erit Indempnes pro Johanne andersone aliter quam per viam Juris Et Johannes
grig deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Johannes erit Indempnis pro dicto Willelmo
Wormet aliter quam per viam Juris Et dictos partes obligantur ad conseruandum
suos plegios indempnes de huismodi fideiussione
